```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
aridity <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_aridity.tif"))
temp <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_temp.tif"))
landforms <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_landforms.tif"))
lc_2008 <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_landcover_2008.tif"))
lc_2019 <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_landcover_2019.tif"))

# plot(aridity)
# plot(temp)
# plot(landforms)
# plot(landcover)

```


```{r}
ecos_map <- function(temp, aridity, landforms, landcover){
  return(temp + 10*aridity + 100*landforms + 1000*landcover)  
}

ecos_2008 <- ecos_map(temp, aridity, landforms, lc_2008)
ecos_2019 <- ecos_map(temp, aridity, landforms, lc_2019)

plot(ecos_2008)
plot(ecos_2019)

unique(ecos_2008)
unique(ecos_2019)
```


```{r}
# --- comparing 2008 and 2019 ---

change <- ecos_2008 - ecos_2019

plot(change)
unique(change)
```
